typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		nameId as string,
		Name as string,
		Country as string,
		Salary as short,
		Date as string,
		DepId as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 split(isNull(toDate(Date,'dd-MMM-yyyy')),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(inValidOutput, ValidOutput)
ConditionalSplit1@inValidOutput derive(filename = 'employee.csv') ~> DerivedColumn1
ConditionalSplit1@ValidOutput derive(filename = 'employee.csv',
		Date = toDate(Date,'dd-MMM-yy')) ~> DerivedColumn2
